summary:
Did you ever asked yourself which character was the strongest ? Here is the answer from Kevin Feige himself. 
“She is more...
caption:
Did you ever asked yourself which character was the strongest ? Here is the answer from Kevin Feige himself.

“She is more powerful than any character we’ve introduced thus far. So that alone tells you that there’s a reason Nick hit that button at the end [of Infinity War], when he realized that they were up against something far bigger than they had ever been up against before. And having her on your side is hopefully going to change the balance of power in a way that they desperately need.”

Si vous vous demandiez qui est le personnage le plus puissant du Marvel Cinematic Universe, je vous conseille de continuer la lecture ✌️

“[Captain Marvel] est plus puissante que n'importe quel autre personnage que l'on a déjà introduit. Juste ça, vous permet de comprendre la raison pour laquelle Nick a appuyé sur ce bouton à la fin d’ Avengers: Infinity War, lorsqu'il comprend qu'il est face à quelque chose de beaucoup trop grand, beaucoup trop puissant. Et l'avoir à ses cotés va, on l'espère, modifier dans le bon sens l'équilibre des forces”
- Kevin Feige

summary: The story is gripping, but even in Jeannette Walls’ own words (in her memoir of the same name) the conflict of sentimentality...
caption: The story is gripping, but even in Jeannette Walls’ own words (in her memoir of the same name) the conflict of sentimentality and abuse is difficult to reconcile. The struggle is greater in a brief film also asking the viewer to suspend disbelief at shifting child actors and Brie Larson playing an age gap of 20 years. There are powerful scenes and strong performances, but as a whole the film disturbs rather than compels.

reblog.comment: The story is gripping, but even in Jeannette Walls’ own words (in her memoir of the same name) the conflict of sentimentality and abuse is difficult to reconcile. The struggle is greater in a brief film also asking the viewer to suspend disbelief at shifting child actors and Brie Larson playing an age gap of 20 years. There are powerful scenes and strong performances, but as a whole the film disturbs rather than compels.

There are powerful scenes and strong performances, but as a whole the film disturbs rather than compels.

There are powerful scenes and strong performances, but as a whole the film disturbs rather than compels.

blog.name: super-hero-confessions
blog.title: Super-Hero-Confessions
blog.description:
Super-hero-confessions is a blog where you can submit your confessions/personal opinions about any of the super hero movies, comics, television shows, cartoons, etc.

The confessions that are posted are those that are submitted; not the opinions of the blog owners. All the confessions will be anonymous when posted. Feel free to submit photos along with your confession if you would like as well.

If you want us to see a post tag it with either #superheroconfessions or #superhero confessions

summary: Brie Larson Talks About The Beauty Of Captain Marvel's Flaws
title: Brie Larson Talks About The Beauty Of Captain Marvel's Flaws
body:
Credit: Marvel

Captain Marvel, starring Brie Larson, is the first female led film from the Marvel Cinematic Universe and it’s being eagerly awaited by fans across the globe.

For those unfamiliar with Captain Marvel, or Carol Danvers as she’s otherwise known, she’s an Air Force pilot who just so happens to have alien powers thanks to being part Kree. Yes we know, it differs to  the comics. Are we…

View On WordPress

summary: ¿Por qué Captain Marvel se establece en los 90? ¡Tenemos la respuesta!
title: ¿Por qué Captain Marvel se establece en los 90? ¡Tenemos la respuesta!
body:
Además de inspirarse en la estética de las películas de acción de la era, tiene un propósito más potente. 

 

Carol Danvers, o Capitán Marvel de Brie Larson, aparecerá en la gran pantalla el próximo año, en una década que precede a la presentación del alter-ego de Tony Stark, pero también antes de la descongelación del Capitán América.

De esta manera, ella es efectivamente la única superhéroe en existencia, según el productor ejecutivo Jonathan Schwartz. Durante una entrevista con Entertainment Weekly, Schwartz explicó: “[La película] le está dando a Carol un lugar en el universo cinematográfico que puede forjar por sí mismoa, donde no era una superheroína entre muchas”.

A través de su entorno de los 90, la Capitán Marvel también presentará a Nick Fury (Samuel L. Jackson) con falta de experiencia en el trabajo, los dos ojos intactos y dando al público una nueva perspectiva del misterioso agente.

[RELACIONADO: ¡Ya tenemos nueva heroína! Mira la primera foto de Brie Larson como Captain Marvel]

Schwartz señala además que la primera película de Marvel liderada por una mujer asiente con los grandes lanzamientos de acción de la época. “La película de acción de los 90 no es la peor referencia del mundo, especialmente cuando comienzas a mirar un poco a Robocop, Total Recall e incluso a Starship Troopers”, explica.

“Terminator 2, Día de la Independencia. Hay una sensación de película de acción de alto concepto que termina siendo muy centrada en personajes pero también súper ruda, que es una especie de diana a la que queríamos darle”.

Acompañando a Larson y a Jackson estarán Jude Law, Djimon Hounsou, Ben Mendelsohn y Lee Pace.

El 8 de marzo de 2019 finalmente se nos presentará la historia de orígenes del personaje, a medida que se va convirtiendo en uno de los héroes más poderosos del universo.


Para seguir leyendo:
Terminator 2 es una de las mayores influencias de Captain Marvel
Stallone te hará sentir fatal al ver cómo entrena para Rambo 5 a sus 72 años
Ni Bond, ni Deadpool… ELLA es el personaje más letal del cine (ha matado a 1296 villanos)

Imágenes: ©Instagram/@brielarson/@Marvel Studios

summary: Jarang Terjadi, Nonton Fashion Show Sambil Payungan di New York Fashion Week
title: Jarang Terjadi, Nonton Fashion Show Sambil Payungan di New York Fashion Week
body:
Jarang Terjadi, Nonton Fashion Show Sambil Payungan di New York Fashion Week

[ad_1]


New York Fashion Week Spring 2019 yang tengah berlangsung di New York City, AS, turut diisi peragaan koleksi teranyar label Rodarte. Alih-alih mempresentasikan koleksi di dalam ruang seperti desainer lainnya, Kate dan Laura Mulleavy, kakak-beradik di balik label tersebut, menggelar fashion show dengan konsep outdoor di taman makam Marble Cemetery, Minggu (9/9/2018). blog.description: I fancy myself one of the contemporary voices in popular culture and an outspoken contributing taste-maker in our "global community". I encourage everyone to get "OUT LOUD" and engage with me in the exciting world of entertainment, news and politics...as we all see it. Let's share some stories!
